short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert foreign currency prices to Naira

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Naira Shopper converts prices in foreign currencies on shopping websites such as Asos, Amazon, Ebay, PrettyLittleThing etc to Naira. It saves you the stress of switching from your online shopping experience to a calculator just to convert foreign prices to Naira.
